detaileddescription.para: GEMM Microkernel - High-Performance Register-Blocked Matrix Multiplication
This file implements optimized GEMM microkernels with multiple backends:

listitem.para: USE_MKL: Intel MKL cblas_sgemm (best performance on Intel CPUs)
USE_ONEDNN: Intel oneDNN matmul primitive (Apache 2.0 licensed)
Native: Our own AVX-512/AVX2/AVX microkernels (no dependencies)

detaileddescription.para: Build with: make USE_MKL=1 # Use Intel MKL make USE_ONEDNN=1 # Use Intel oneDNN make # Use native kernels

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *A, const float *B, float *C, int M, int N, int K, int B_transposed)
